Name: Andra Landing Battlefield Postcard
Description: An untamed and hazardous expanse—once a major battlefield in the Asterleeds Independence War—where wild flora now thrives in striking contrast with the enduring remnants of war...
Description$english: An untamed and hazardous expanse—once a major battlefield in the Asterleeds Independence War—where wild flora now thrives in striking contrast with the enduring remnants of war...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
